div.p: From Eliza Bromby to James McCulloch
M65/4187, unit 209, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Transcribed 17.8.93. To proof. GREETING?? ENDING??
MS has the letterhead of the Ladies' Leichardt Search Committee.
The Ladies' Leichhardt Search Committee wishing to secure for the enterprize in which they are engaged the support of the neighbouring colonies, especially of Queensland wrote some time ago to Lady Bowen asking if she would interest herself in the cause. The answer received from her ladyship I now beg to enclose,
D. Bowen to E. Tierney, 24 April 1865 (in this edition as M65-04-24), filed with Bromby's letter. while it holds out the hope of assistance from the colony, it seems to suggest that her Ladyship and the Government of Queensland may desire to know whether the Committee have a prospect of aid from the Victorian Government. It is for that reason Sir that the Committee now wish to enquire somewhat earlier than they would otherwise have done, whether they [can] hope for a grant from [...] Government.

For an account of the plants and prospects of the Committee I beg to refer you to a letter of Dr Mueller which appeared in the Economist yesterday.
B65.05.03, a copy of which is filed with Bromby's letter. By the last mail the Committee sent addresses to Her Majesty the Princess of Wales the Princess of Prussia and through the English papers they will appeal to the sympathy of all civilized communities —

His Excellency kindly [forwarded] the address to the Queen [...] Princess of Wales, that to the Princess of Prussia was sent by the Prussian consul — The Committee trust that your Government Sir will not withhold its support from this philanthropic enterprize they are most anxious to preserve its character as a Victorian undertaking and to retain for themselves the superintendence throughout. Will you allow me to name the first hour you have kindly proposed for seeing some of the Committee viz 12 o clock on Tuesday next —
